short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save and organize images, videos, and text snippets. Features: categorization, slideshow, color extraction, and zip download.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🌟🎉✨ Embark on an extraordinary creative journey with the Tiniest Gallery extension! Create your own gallery of stunning images, videos, and text snippets!

- Save images, videos, and text snippets from any webpage. 💾 🖼️ 🎥 💬
- Organize your content into different categories. 📁 🗂️
- View your saved gallery in a beautiful, responsive layout. 👀 📸
- Enjoy a fullscreen slideshow of your saved items. 🖥️ 🎠 ✨
- Extract and copy dominant colors from images and videos. 🎨 🌈
- Save HEX codes of palette colors with a simple click. 🎨 💾
- Download your saved content as a zip file. ⬇️ 📦
- Filter your content by type: images, videos, or text snippets. 🔍 🏷️
- Control slideshow duration with an intuitive slider. ⏱️ 🎚️
- Quickly access your gallery through a toolbar icon. 🚀 🔧

🔒 Privacy-focused: No sign-up required, no login needed, and your data is saved only on your computer - never on any external servers! 🖥️ 🔐

💯 Completely FREE: Enjoy all features without any cost, hidden fees, or storage limits! 🆓 💸 🚫

The Tiniest Gallery extension is a powerful tool for artists, designers, researchers, and anyone seeking visual inspiration or an organized personal collection. 🎨✨🖌️

Unleash your creativity, organize your inspirations, and discover a world of captivating colors and images - all while maintaining complete control over your data. 🌈✨🎨
Install Tiniest Gallery now and let the magic unfold in fullscreen glory, right on your own device! 🌟🌈🎉💻
